articles.title: Fitness lessons you need to learn from Samantha
articles.description: Here are ten fitness lessons you need to learn from Samantha to be fit and healthy.
articles.content: Starting from her daily gym, Samantha also does aerial yoga, martial arts, parkour and weightlifting so she diesnt bore her mind and body by choosing fitness first.

articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: RBI is setting aside more money for rainy day, payout drops
articles.description: While income for 2021-22 increased by 20%, expenditure rose by 280%, which resulted in the overall surplus transferred to the government decreasing 69% to ₹30,307.45 crore from ₹99,122 crore in 2020-21.

articles.description: Uttar Pradesh news : घटना के बारे में जानकारी देते हुए एसपी दीपक भूकर ने बताया कि वांटेड अपराधी मोनू उर्फ मैनुद्दीन ने जांच पड़ताल के लिए रोके जाने पर पुलिस के ऊपर गोलियां चलाईं। इसके बाद अतिरिक्त पुलिस बल को उसे घेरने और गिरफ्तार करने के लिए बुलाया गया।

articles.author: Sutanuka Ghosal
articles.title: Tomato, mango prices soar across India as heatwave scorches crop
articles.description: Mango production in Uttar Pradesh, the largest producer, is expected to be the lowest in two decades, with 80% of the crop being damaged due to the heatwave.
articles.content:
An unusual heatwave that started at the beginning of the summer this year has impacted the tomato and mango crop, driving up their prices beyond 100 a kilo in many parts of the country.

articles.author: Rebecca Samervel,Vijay V Singh
articles.title: Arrest illegal? Bizman’s remand hearing delayed
articles.description: In a rarity, the remand hearing of arrested Pune businessman Avinash Bhosale was adjourned on Friday by three days after his lawyer said the arrest was "illegal".

articles.author: Rebecca Samervel
articles.title: SIT: Officer checked Aryan’s phone chats without seizing it
articles.description: In an internal report, the NCB's SIT has faulted the investigation process in the drugs case, saying Aryan Khan's mobile phone was "voluntarily handed over by him" but it "was not followed by formal seizure procedure".

articles.author: Farheen Hussain
articles.title: ‘Not interested in studies’ key reason for children dropping out of school
articles.description: A government school teacher in North Karnataka has been relentlessly trying to bring out-of-school children back to campus. But he says he is shocked to hear many kids say they are no longer interested in studies.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Vandita Sharma state’s new CS
articles.description: Senior IAS officer Vandita Sharma was on Friday appointed as the new chief secretary, making her the fourth woman to hold the top post. Sharma will replace P Ravi Kumar, who will retire on May 31.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: With 4 seats, BJP controls council
articles.description: All seven candidates in the fray for the biennial polls to the legislative council — elected by MLAs — were on Friday declared elected unopposed, taking the strength of the ruling BJP to 39.

articles.title: Got Rs65k cr investment proposals in Davos: CM
articles.description: CM Basavaraj Bommai on Friday said the state government has succeeded in drawing investment commitments worth Rs 65,000 crore with its participation at the just-concluded World Economic Forum Meet in Davos, Switzerland.
